DOC.brief_summary: This study design report 3-year result triple therapy vitrectomy , intravitreal triamcinolone macular laser photocoagulation intractable diabetic macular edema . Previously author report 1-year result ( Am J Ophthalmol . 2007 Dec ; 144 ( 6 ) :878-885 . Epub 2007 Oct 15 . ) .
DOC.brief_title: Triple Therapy Pars Plana Vitrectomy Grid/Focal Laser Diabetic Macular Edema ( DME )
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis diabetes mellitus intractable diffuse DME ( diffuse DME respond recur previous IVTA and/or macular focal laser photocoagulation ) central subfield macular thickness ( CST ) great 250Î¼m presence vitreomacular traction prior history treatment DME within 3 month vitreoretinal surgery
